mdRecord.dcterms:title: Rush Holt Will Hogtie Willie on Nov. 4th
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Leasure, Al
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Look! Ain't that hoppa-long Marland the bull throwing champ?""Yeah! For the past four years that outfit tried to make the public believe in Santa Claus!""Every campaign has its clowns!""Got any saddle soap?""All we've got is soft soap.""Rush Holt will hogtie Willie on Nov. 4th!""I've been with this act a long time but I've got a feeling this outfit is heading for the last roundup!"
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: American
Cartoons (Commentary)
Holt, Rush Dew, 1905-1955
Politics and government
West Virginia
